INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant (especially for the ciclosporin, extremely large for the tacrolimus)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage of the immunosuppressant during the administration of the medications together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Very large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If these must be administered together, strict testing of the renal function, blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, and possible adjustment of the dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Excessive immunodepression with risk of lymphoproliferative syndrome
Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the treatment with these medications together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to decrease of its metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the treatment with these medications together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to decrease of its metabolism
Very large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If these are administered together, strict testing of the renal function, blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, and possible adjustment of the dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to the inhibition of its metabolism and of the creatinemia
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the substances together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Excessive immunodepression with risk of lymphoproliferative disorders (LPDs)
Decrease of the blood concentrations and of the effectiveness of the immunosuppressant, due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the inducer
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Increase the dosage of the immunosuppressant according to tests of the blood concentrations. Reduce the dosage after the inducer is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Very large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If these substances are administered together, strict testing of the renal function, blood concentration dosages of the immunosuppressant, and adjustment of its dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Very large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If these substances are administered together, strict testing of the renal function, blood concentration dosages of the immunosuppressant, and possible adjustment of the dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Very large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If these substances are administered together, strict testing of the renal function, blood concentration dosages of the immunosuppressant, and possible adjustment of the dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant, due to the enzymatic inducer effect of the St Johns wort, with risk of reduction of effectiveness, even complete loss of the effect which can have possibly serious consequences (rejection of a graft).
Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage of the immunosuppressant during the treatment and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the bioavailability of the immunosuppressant and as a result of its undesirable effects.
Very large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If these substances are administered together, strict testing of the renal function, blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, and possible adjustment of the dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of its dosage during the administration of the medications together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the two substances together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its metabolism by the ranolazine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical and biological monitoring and possible adjustment of the dosage of the immunosuppressant.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant (decrease of its hepatic metabolism)
Increase of the plasma concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism by the telaprevir
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of its dosage during the administration of the substances together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Very large increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If these substances are administered together, strict testing of the renal function, blood concentration dosage of the immunosuppressant, and possible adjustment of the dosage.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of general vaccinal disease, possibly fatal.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: And during the 3 months following the treatment.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the concentrations of the immunosuppressants, with the consequence of a risk of ineffectiveness
Increase of the blood concentrations of the immunosuppressant due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism by the voriconazole
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -with the everolimus, the sirolimus, and the temsirolimus
